sentences.en: On the molecular level becoming a kind of maize inbred line, finding a certain similarity on the campestral agronomic characters.
sentences.cn: 自交系各处理分子上聚为一类的材料，在田间的农艺性状表现出一定相似性。

sentences.en: Yet despite this inequity and partially because of it, a larger degree of the indigenous peoples retained their campestral culture, wisdom and knowledge.
sentences.cn: 尽管这不公义的部分原因是因此而起，仍有相当程度的土著人民维持著他们乡野的文化、智慧与知识。

trans.tran_en: of or relating to open fields or country
